metadata.title: CVE-2021-32142 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: Buffer Overflow vulnerability in LibRaw linux/unix v0.20.0 allows attackerto escalate privileges via the LibRaw_buffer_datastream::gets(char*, int)in /src/libraw/src/libraw_datastream.cpp.

criterions.comment: libraw: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
